description:
Upward Mobility presents it's exclusive VCP4 VMware Exam Prep app for Palm webOS presents over 200 original questions to prepare you for the VMware Certified Professional of vSphere 4 exam. 

239 simulated exam questions with clear and detailed explanatory answers were written exclusively for Upward Mobility by a certified VMware expert. This app covers all topics on the exam, including how to:
Plan, Install and Upgrade VMware ESX/ESXi 
Configure ESX/ESXi Networking 
Configure ESX/ESXi Storage 
Install and Configure vCenter Server 
Deploy and Manage Virtual Machines and vApps 
Manage Compliance 
Establish Service Levels 
Perform Basic Troubleshooting and Alarm Management 

Upward Mobility HP webOS apps are designed with an exclusive intuitive UI. They provide a Study Mode, where questions are paired with clear explanations and the user can proceed at their own pace, as well as a Test Mode designed to simulate the exam experience, where the user can set question and time restraints and their results are presented to them upon completion. 

Be sure to ask your employer about training reimbursement for the purchase of this app! 

This app is not affiliated with VMware. 

About Upward Mobility 

Upward Mobility is an independent test preparation and management education apps company that creates high quality material that is witty and engaging, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All of our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by subject matter expert writers and undergoes a thorough review process. 

Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you. .
